verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8737><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and the men <S%H582><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and fell down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa <S%H1533><s%>.

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> followed hard <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon Saul <S%H7586><s%> and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>; and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Y'honatan <S%H3083><s%>, and Abinadab <S%H41><s%>, and Malchishua <S%H4444><s%>, Saul's <S%H7586><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> went sore <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and the archers <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8688><s%> <S%H582><s%> <S%H7198><s%> hit <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him; and he was sore <S%H3966><s%> wounded <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the archers <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8688><s%> <S%H582><s%> <S%H7198><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> unto his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H3627><s%>, Draw <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy sword <S%H2719><s%>, and thrust me through <S%H1856><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therewith; lest these uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and thrust me through <S%H1856><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and abuse <S%H5953><s%> <S%H8694><s%> me. But his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H3627><s%> would <S%H14><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not; for he was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon it.

And when his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H3627><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> likewise upon his sword <S%H2719><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him.

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H3627><s%>, and all his men <S%H582><s%>, that same day <S%H3117><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>, and they that were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the men <S%H582><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and that Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in them.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to strip <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%>, that they found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilboa <S%H1533><s%>.

And they cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>, and stripped off <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his armour <S%H3627><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, to publish <S%H1319><s%> <S%H8763><s%> it in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their idols <S%H6091><s%>, and among the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his armour <S%H3627><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1045><s%>: and they fastened <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his body <S%H1472><s%> to the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Bethshan <S%H1052><s%>.

And when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Jabeshgilead <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of that which the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>;

All the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H381><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all night <S%H3915><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the body <S%H1472><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> and the bodies <S%H1472><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> from the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Bethshan <S%H1052><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them there.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their bones <S%H6106><s%>, and buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them under a tree <S%H815><s%> at Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>, and fasted <S%H6684><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
